archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Transition
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.10.1] The purpose of the Transition process is to establish a capability for a system to provide services specified by stakeholder requirements in the operational environment.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 88

properties.value: Gemäß ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 (laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE): "[6.4.10.1] Der Zweck des Prozesses "Übergabe" besteht darin, ein System zu befähigen, die in den Stakeholder-Anforderungen spezifizierten Dienste in der Betriebsumgebung zu erbringen".

As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.10.1] The purpose of the Transition process is to establish a capability for a system to provide services specified by stakeholder requirements in the operational environment.
